getNumOfNodesMaintained

public int getNumOfNodesMaintained()
Number of nodes a routing driver has as its current contancts. This property is provided mainly for IterativeRoutingDriver. 20 for Kademlia.

setNumOfNodesMaintained

public int setNumOfNodesMaintained(int num)

getQueryConcurrency

public int getQueryConcurrency()
Concurrency of simultaneous queries. This property is valid only for combinations of IterativeRoutingDriver and a routing algorithm which query to all contacts (e.g. Kademlia).

setQueryConcurrency

public int setQueryConcurrency(int concurrency)

getUseThreadPool

public boolean getUseThreadPool()

setUseThreadPool

public boolean setUseThreadPool(boolean use)

getRoutingTimeout

public long getRoutingTimeout()
A Routing Service gives up a routing when it could not receive a results of the routing. Note that only recursive one causes a time-out.

setRoutingTimeout

public long setRoutingTimeout(long timeout)
